about-me.name: My name is Lee Freeman
where-i-am-from.milton-keynes: I was born and raised in Milton Keynes. It's famous for having concrete cows and many roundabouts.
where-i-am-from.huddersfield: I went to university in Huddersfield. It is very northern and hilly.
where-i-am-from.amsterdam: I moved to Amsterdam because...I was sick of Milton Keynes and just fancied it.
